Introduction

Shin Hye-jeong is a South Korean singer, actress, and model. She is best known as a member of AOA, formed by FNC Entertainment.

Hyejeong competed in a supermodel pageant in 2010 where an FNC casting director discovered her, becoming a trainee under the agency in August.

In August 2012, upon Hyejeongs musical debut, she simultaneously started her acting career—appearing in the TV series "A Gentleman's Dignity".
